title: Laracasts - Jan. 6 - Easy HTTP Requests
description:
If you're anything like me, using PHP and the curl library to make HTTP requests can often be confusing. Luckily, packages like Guzzle can drastically simplify the process. In this lesson, we'll use the GitHub and Twitter APIs as examples for working with Guzzle.

Pay attention to the homework at the end of the lesson. In the next lesson, we'll review the solution!
